name: knife
description: This object contains some blood trace which might be from the victim. It was found hidden in the mall.

name: blood
description: A sample collected from the victim at the pharmacy may help to identify and match blood found in other items.

name: cloth
description: A piece of cloth with a small trace of blood, which might be from the victim was found at the petrol station.

name: gun
description: This object has some trace of gunpowder, this means it could've been used to murder the victim, was found inside the mansion.

name: finger prints
description: Some finger prints were found in various place at the petrol station, some are from the victim and suspects.

name: axe
description: Used in case of emergency to open train's stuck doors, this object may also be used to harm or kill the victim.

name: barrel
description: Petrol barrel with enough size to hide a body is missing from the petrol station.

name: cctv mall
description: An image of a day before the victim's murder shows someone following him in the mall's car park.

name: chainsaw
description: Used to trim tree branches, this object was found in the bushes under the bridge in the park.

name: cigarette
description: Some cigarette butts were found at the train station, these objects might help to get some DNAs.

name: tools
description: A pliers and some screwdrivers found with the train operator may be used to torture the victim.

name: email
description: Emails from many people who threated to kill the victim were found in his computer at the mansion.

name: glasses
description: The victim's glasses were found at the mall's car park where the cameras could not reach.

name: gloves
description: Similar gloves were found at the train station, were also used by the same suspect following the victim in the mall's car park.

name: hammer
description: This object was found in the mansion inside the maid's purse, and it was washed out.

name: hat
description: The victim's $5.000 hat was for sale at the pawnshop, in order to pay some depts.

name: id
description: A fake id with a photo of the victim was found in the mall's toilet.

name: jewelry
description: The victim's late wife red diamond necklace worth $100.00 was for sale at the pawnshop, in order to pay some depts.

name: letter
description: A letter from the victim fearing for his life was written a night before his murder, was found in his bed at the mansion.

name: mask
description: Found with the petrol station's owner, this object might be used to hide the suspect identity.

name: match
description: A used match found close to the barrels could be used by the same suspect who smokes cigarette.

name: medical report
description: Victim's medical information about his health. The victim has been sufering from memory loss and depression.

name: notebook
description: Victim's notebook found in downtown, was stolen and then abandoned with a homeless.

name: cctv petrol station
description: An image of a night before the victim's murder shows someone stelling a barrel from the petrol station.

name: phone
description: Stolen phone from the victim was on sale at the pawnshop, contained unidentified threat messages.

name: pill
description: Victim's memory loss pill was altered in order to progress his disease, found at the pharmacy.

name: pillow
description: The victim's hair strand was found on the pillow used by the homeless. The victim could've been suffocated.

name: poison
description: Toxic substance capable of killing someone was being developed by the pharmaceutical. It might be used to kill the victim.

name: ring
description: Diamond ring from victim's late wife worth $10.000 in order to pay depts was found for sale at the pawnshop.

name: rope
description: Used to carry the homeless stuff around in downtown, this object could've been used to hang the victim.

name: scissor
description: Some traces of blood from the victim were found on this object buried in the mansion's garden.

name: shears
description: Found in the south garden, this object was hidden in the same location as the chainsaw.

name: shoe print
description: Shoe prints found close to the bridge in the park, have some common patern of a shoe sold at the mall.

name: shoes
description: These shoes have similar patern of a shoe sold at the mall. They were found in downtown worn by the homeless.

name: shovel
description: Found in the park, this object has traces 2 types of soil. It might be used somewhere else.

name: sickle
description: This object is not commonly used in a garden, its use is more common in harvest. It also might be used to harm or kill the victim.

name: stick
description: For sale at the pawnshop, the victim's stick was left there by a stinky skinny guy in order to get some money.

name: syringe
description: This object has 2 types of chemical, one for sleep and another for pain. It could've been used against the victim, was found in downtown.

name: taser
description: Mall security's missing taser found in the mall car park. It could've been used to stun the victim.

name: ticket
description: A ticket was used hours before the murder. Its route was from train station to a station near the mansion.

name: warrant
description: This warrant can only be used once in order to search a place. Another warrant is required after this one is used.
